args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Suppose S ‚äÇ ‚Ñù, c is a cluster point of S, f : S ‚Üí ‚Ñù and g : S ‚Üí ‚Ñù are functions, and a ‚àà ‚Ñù,
    such that f(x) ‚Üí L and g(x) ‚Üí M as x ‚Üí c. Then a * f(x) ‚Üí a * L as x ‚Üí c. -/
variable {S : Set ‚Ñù} {c a L M : ‚Ñù} {f g : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù}

theorem tendsto_const_mul_of_tendsto (hc : c ‚àà closure (S \ {c}))
  (hf : Tendsto f (nhdsWithin c S) (nhds L)) (hg : Tendsto g (nhdsWithin c S) (nhds M)) :
  Tendsto (fun x => a * f x) (nhdsWithin c S) (nhds (a * L)) := by sorry
